languages.text: "Миряне отвлекают сего ткача от медитации. Впрочем, и такую помеху можно обратить в тренировку, что закалит концентрацию".

traits.locale_text: "Миряне отвлекают сего ткача от медитации. Впрочем, и такую помеху можно обратить в тренировку, что закалит концентрацию".

languages.text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."
languages.original_text: "Миряне отвлекают сего ткача от медитации. Впрочем, и такую помеху можно обратить в тренировку, что закалит концентрацию".

traits.locale_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance can be turned into training that hardens one's focus."
"The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance can be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

"The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."
"The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

languages.text: «Los laicos están interrumpiendo la meditación de este tejedor. Aunque, bien pensado, incluso esa molestia puede considerarse un entrenamiento para reforzar la concentración».
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

traits.locale_text: «Los laicos están interrumpiendo la meditación de este tejedor. Aunque, bien pensado, incluso esa molestia puede considerarse un entrenamiento para reforzar la concentración».

languages.text: 「このスピナーの瞑想の邪魔をしているのは素人だ。そしてまた、そのような妨害さえも、集中力を高める訓練に変わるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

traits.locale_text: 「このスピナーの瞑想の邪魔をしているのは素人だ。そしてまた、そのような妨害さえも、集中力を高める訓練に変わるかもしれない」

languages.text: “教外人士正在干扰织网者的冥想。不过，即便是这样的干扰，也可以当做是训练的一部分，可以让我们的注意力变得更加集中。”
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

traits.locale_text: “教外人士正在干扰织网者的冥想。不过，即便是这样的干扰，也可以当做是训练的一部分，可以让我们的注意力变得更加集中。”

languages.text: "Die Laien unterbrechen die Meditation dieses Spinners. Andererseits kann so eine Störung auch eine Lektion zur Stärkung der Konzentration sein."
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

traits.locale_text: "Die Laien unterbrechen die Meditation dieses Spinners. Andererseits kann so eine Störung auch eine Lektion zur Stärkung der Konzentration sein."

languages.text: « Les profanes perturbent ma méditation. Cela étant dit, même un tel désagrément peut faire l'objet d'un exercice visant à renforcer les capacités de concentration. »
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."

traits.locale_text: « Les profanes perturbent ma méditation. Cela étant dit, même un tel désagrément peut faire l'objet d'un exercice visant à renforcer les capacités de concentration. »

languages.text: "Avam kitlesi, bu dokurun meditasyonuna sekte vuruyor. Yine de bu raddede bir huzursuzluk bile kişinin odaklanmasını güçlendirecek bir imtihana dönüşebilir."
languages.original_text: "The laypeople are interrupting this spinner's meditation. Then again, even such a disturbance may be turned into training that hardens one's focus."
